text: Onek Sadher Moyna ()http://www.bmdb.com.bd/movie/13/ is a 2014 Bangladeshi Bengali-language romantic drama film directed by Jakir Hossain Raju and written by Farzana. distributed by Jaaz Multimedia. It stars Mahiya Mahi and Bappy Chowdhury in the lead roles. ==Plot== Moyna is a beautiful village girl, loved by both Moti an educated village boy and Mona a simple and silly village boy. Everything get changed when Moyna is lost from both of their lives. Will this love story be a happy ending or a tragedy or both ? ==Cast== * Mahiya Mahi as Moyna * Bappy Chowdhury as Moti * Anisur Rahman Milon as Mona * Bipasha * Ali Raj ==Soundtrack== {| class="wikitable" |+ Track listing |- ! No. !! Title !! Singer(s) !! Lyric !!
